reviewText: If you're in the mood for insane sex explosions watch this movie!This movie has the incredibly amazing premise of choice, who do you choose? The straight laced girl or the wild one? Well businessman Takashi goes the wild road when he chooses Sakura, a crazed nymphomaniac with a never ending appetite that leaves Takashi sexually impotent and his family in a hilarious orgy fest.Granted sex is important in this movie, it's the main feature of the genre, but I like to think that there is a deeper message behind it all. Sakura constantly mentions how Japanese people are "so behind on the times" and how they are "nothing like the forward thinking Americans" do I smell satire? Watch and find out!
Title: N/A

reviewText: The Japanese seem to have a knack at making some superb films. For me, recent examples have been 'Shall We Dance' and 'Ping Pong' (both reviewed more recently); the latter capturing the very essence of two perspectives on life. As for the current movie; the protagonist marries an effervescent woman. She eventually exhausts him with her voracious sexual appetite, in the context of her love for him. In an effort to 'please' (broadly defined), she moves on to other members of the family. It sounds sordid but it is, in fact, very funny indeed. There are even therapeutic overtones, let alone results, from her escapades. This film captures pornography and fun; a rare combination in this genre.Ian Hunter.Author of `e-Love'.
Title: N/A

reviewText: A man meets two women at a party and walks away with one whom he marries (the one he passes up is prettier??!). Wedding bliss is short lived as he finds out his wife is a nymphomaniac, He soon spends nights away from home to escape her and just to get some rest. Being lonely, his wife spreads her love first to her husbands' grandfather who experiences his first sexual experience in years and regins his ablility to walk, then to her father-in-law who his first experience since his wife died, and finally awakens her prudish, repressed sister in law to the pleasures of sex. It's screwball comedy, erotica, some black humor and some bad taste all rolled into one, but it works and it is great. Not for all tastes though.The director filmed two movies at the same time and in "the Japanese Wife Part 2" the man ends up with the other girl who was at the party and who has a different but equally strange personality and family. I hope it's released very soon.
summary: A very funny demented screwball comedy

A bit more honesty would have saved it from "Pink" statuswhich only implies dishonesty.Otherwise, the production values were good - lighting, sound, continuityand camera work.

reviewText: If you're reading this review, the I'm guessing you've already read the product deescription. So with that in mind, here is my take on this film.  First, the lead actress is smokin' hot. Can you spell MILF? She is the type of wife (good housekeeper, a lady in public and a uninhibted slut in private) that most men would create if they could. Her enthusiasem for sex is something that lead her to wear out her husbund (he can't get it up any more because the wife has basicly riden him to death), rape and reinvigorate grandpa (before he was a feeble old man in a wheelcahir, after sex with the lead actress he can walk and act like a young man), and thaw-out the frigid sister (she hated men/sex to start, afterwards she has sex with just about any one).Each sex scene in this movie gets more and more outrageous and more and more funny.  If the pelvic shots weren't blurred-out then this probably would be considered a hard-core movie. Although, when you watch the extras/interviews on this disc you find out that one of the reasons the pelvic shots are blurred out is because the actors wore prosthetics, and the sex is simulated. But, if the extras didn't tell you that, you'd never notice the difference.  The most outragous scene in the movie is the last scene when an oblivious husbaund walks-in on his wife having and orgy with his entire family, and the husbunds is forced to partisipate
summary: of all the pink porn I've watched, this is by far my favorite
